import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.preprocessing import StandardScaler, LabelEncoder
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestClassifier
from xgboost import XGBClassifier
from lightgbm import LGBMClassifier
from catboost import CatBoostClassifier
from sklearn.metrics import accuracy_score
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings("ignore")

# Load data
train_df = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Feature engineering
# 1. Extract title from Name
def extract_title(name):
    if pd.isna(name):
        return 'Unknown'
    title = name.split(',')[1].split('.')[0].strip()
    title_map = {
        'Mr': 'Mr', 'Mrs': 'Mrs', 'Miss': 'Miss', 'Master': 'Master',
        'Don': 'Rare', 'Rev': 'Rare', 'Dr': 'Rare', 'Mme': 'Rare', 'Mlle': 'Rare',
        'Col': 'Rare', 'Capt': 'Rare', 'Major': 'Rare', 'Jonkheer': 'Rare',
        'Sir': 'Rare', 'Lady': 'Rare', 'Countess': 'Rare'
    }
    return title_map.get(title, 'Rare')

train_df['Title'] = train_df['Name'].apply(extract_title)
test_df['Title'] = test_df['Name'].apply(extract_title)

# 2. Fill missing Age with median based on Pclass and Title
train_df['Age'] = train_df['Age'].fillna(train_df.groupby('Pclass')['Age'].transform('median'))
test_df['Age'] = test_df['Age'].fillna(test_df.groupby('Pclass')['Age'].transform('median'))

# 3. Fill missing Fare with median of the same Pclass
train_df['Fare'] = train_df['Fare'].fillna(train_df.groupby('Pclass')['Fare'].transform('median'))
test_df['Fare'] = test_df['Fare'].fillna(test_df.groupby('Pclass')['Fare'].transform('median'))

# 4. Fill missing Embarked with mode
train_df['Embarked'] = train_df['Embarked'].fillna(train_df['Embarked'].mode()[0])
test_df['Embarked'] = test_df['Embarked'].fillna(test_df['Embarked'].mode()[0])

# 5. Create family size feature
train_df['FamilySize'] = train_df['SibSp'] + train_df['Parch'] + 1
test_df['Fa
